Parma.Holy Name High School:
Holy Name High School (HNHS) is a private, Catholic, co-educational high school in Parma Heights, Ohio, USA. It is a part of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Cleveland.
Holy Name is a member of the Great Lakes Conference with Parma Senior, Normandy, Valley Forge, Elyria Catholic, Bay Village, and Rocky River High Schools.


== History ==
Founded in 1914, Holy Name was the first Catholic high school in the Cleveland area to enroll both male and female students.
